Text: More  ASIA-PACIFIC Hong Kong's Office of the Privacy Commissioner for Personal Data has announced a fine of HK$84,000 against telecom SmarTone Mobile Communications for violations of the Personal Data (Privacy) Ordinance.
Cause: violations of the Personal Data (Privacy) Ordinance.
Effect: More  ASIA-PACIFIC Hong Kong's Office of the Privacy Commissioner for Personal Data has announced a fine of HK$84,000 against telecom SmarTone Mobile Communications
Sentence: <e2>More  ASIA-PACIFIC Hong Kong's Office of the Privacy Commissioner for Personal Data has announced a fine of HK$84,000 against telecom SmarTone Mobile Communications</e2> for <e1>violations of the Personal Data (Privacy) Ordinance.</e1>
